front.title: A Simple Mode of Facsimile Using Internet Mail

abstract.t: This specification provides for 'simple mode' carriage of facsimile data using Internet mail. Extensions to this document will follow. The current specification employs standard protocols and file formats such as TCP/IP, Internet mail protocols [1, 2, 3], MIME [4, 10, 11], and TIFF for Facsimile [5, 12, 14].
